GClasses::GDissimilarityMetric

GClasses::GDissimilarityMetric Class Reference

This class enables you to define dissimilarity (distance) metrics between two vectors. pScaleFactors is an optional parameter (it can be NULL) that lets the calling class scale the significance of each dimension. Distance metrics that do not mix with this concept may simply ignore any scale factors. Typically, classes that use this should be able to assume that the triangle inequality will hold, but do not necessarily enforce the parallelogram law. More...

Detailed Description

This class enables you to define dissimilarity (distance) metrics between two vectors. pScaleFactors is an optional parameter (it can be NULL) that lets the calling class scale the significance of each dimension. Distance metrics that do not mix with this concept may simply ignore any scale factors. Typically, classes that use this should be able to assume that the triangle inequality will hold, but do not necessarily enforce the parallelogram law.
